help.text: ℹ️ Help for BCN Transit Bot ℹ️ This bot lets you quickly check updated information about Metro and Bus in the city of Barcelona. 📋 Available commands: • /start – Start a new search • /help – Show this help message 🚇 To check the next metro trains: 1. Tap 'Metro' in the menu. 2. Select a line. 3. Select a station. 4. You’ll see updated schedules and more details. 🚌 To check the next buses: 1. Tap 'Bus' in the menu. 2. Select a line. 3. Select a station from the interactive map. 4. You’ll see updated schedules and more details. ⭐ To check your favorites: 1. Tap 'Favorites' in the menu. 2. Select one of your saved favorites. 3. You’ll see updated schedules and more details. 🌐 To select the Language: 1. Tap 'Language' in the menu. 2. Select one of the available languages (English, Spanish or Catalan). 3. You will see the application updated to the new language. Do you have questions or suggestions? I’m here to help! 📬 Contact: github.com/mg-diego/BCN-Transit-Bot 🔖 Version: v1.4
